question: Which of the following reaction/s does not yield an amine?
I. <katex>$R-X + NH_3$</katex>, II. <katex>$R-C\equiv N + H_2/Ni$</katex>, III. <katex>$R-C\equiv N + H_3O^+$</katex>, IV. <katex>$R-CONH_2 + LiAlH_4$</katex>
explanation: III: Hydrolysis of cyanides (<katex>$R-CN$</katex>) in acidic medium gives Carboxylic Acids, not amines.
Others (Ammonolysis, Reduction of Nitriles, Reduction of Amides) yield amines.
